title: Why do so many people hate on Billie Eilish? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hahaha… I was reading these answers to the question “Which are the darkest songs?”. Someone listed some of Billie Eilish songs. And immediately another answer said fuck off to her songs, and listed his own choices. I honestly don’t know why someone would have that kind of reaction just because someone mentioned her name. Most of the people of my demographics don’t listen to her music. But they don’t hate her either. My friends hate someone like Nicki Minaj, Lil Pump, and all those folks. But they seem to be fine with Billie Eilish’s music. They seemed more fascinated, and impressed than anything else. My grandma watched one of her video, and changed the channel cause she found it a bit creepy, and scary. She said she liked the uniqueness of the music, but just couldn’t stand the video. When I told her about how young she was. She was actually amazed. So, i don’t think most people hate Billie Eilish. But those who do hate her might do so because how she tends to draw young edgy teen towards her music. Or how she herself is a weird edgy teen… Besides, anything that is popular always tends to draw negativity from certain section.

Honestly I really don’t know why. She’s an amazing 18 year old who is so unique and is one of the nicest people ever! Especially to her fans, and she hasn’t done anything wrong or been in trouble, ever. They probably are just jealous of the talent she’s got and how she wears “baggy clothes.” Her talent is amazing, and honestly, she is one of the only people who can use auto-tune correctly! Hell yeah, she’s been depressed, and she truly shows it, but that’s not something to hate on her for. And I wish people would stop saying that she whispers into her mic! She doesn’t!! And have those haters listened to those songs where she is singing her heart out? I guess not, they don’t know that. And she is NOT SMUG. Everyone’s gotta understand that. Those haters just shout out things that their being like they could ever be better. She is amazing to her fans and makes beautiful music! It’s just that those people are jealous and they don’t know what she is, truly inside!
